body: RazorMachine ============ A really easy to use .Net Razor 2 template engine. This implementation supports layouts (masterpages) and a _viewStart construct, just like MVC does support these features. The RazorMachine works independently from MVC. It only needs the System.Web.Razor reference. It almost works exacly like Asp.Net MVC. Take a look at the examples at the wiki to see how easy this framework works. This RazorMachine originally was published at the CodeProject
tagline: .Net Razor 2 template engine, supporting layouts (masterpages), that works outside MVC
name: Razormachine
